html:
2025-0747
2025-10-30IRCCImmigration and Refugee Protection ActRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Exempting Protected Persons in Canada from Medical Examinations when Applying for Permanent Residence)Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Exempting Protected Persons in Canada from Medical Examinations when Applying for Permanent Residence) in order to exempt protected persons in Canada and their accompanying family members in Canada who meet the criteria, from the requirement to undergo a subsequent immigration medical examination as part of their application for permanent residence.Registration: SOR/2025-0223 Publication Date: 2025-11-19
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Exempting Protected Persons in Canada from Medical Examinations when Applying for Permanent Residence)
precis: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Exempting Protected Persons in Canada from Medical Examinations when Applying for Permanent Residence) in order to exempt protected persons in Canada and their accompanying family members in Canada who meet the criteria, from the requirement to undergo a subsequent immigration medical examination as part of their application for permanent residence.
